title: GTX 1060 memory issue + Tensor Flow Error
body:
I'm trying to run the 5.Xseg) train
I have a GTX 1060 6GB + 16GB RAM + Ryzen 7 2700
Using python 3.6.4 (3.9 wasn't allowing me to install tensorflow)

This is what shows off to me in CMD when executing it:

> Running trainer.


Model first run.

Choose one or several GPU idxs (separated by comma).

[CPU] : CPU
  [0] : GeForce GTX 1060 6GB

[0] Which GPU indexes to choose? : 0
0

[head] Face type ( h/mf/f/wf/head ?:help ) : head
head
[4] Batch_size ( 2-16 ?:help ) : 4
4
